alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 05 at 1:26PM PDT until October 06 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures 90 to 100 expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From noon today to 7 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...High temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur, especially with physical exertion during the afternoons. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures will be mostly in the 60s which will help mitigate the effects of the daytime heat. * OUTLOOK...A cooling trend will begin Saturday.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
